      • addChest

        public void addChest(java.lang.String username,
            int chestID,
            java.lang.String style,
            int size)
              throws DatabaseException
        Add a chest instance to the database
        Parameters:
        String - username The name of the user who owns the chest
        int - chestID A number to identify the current chest
        String - style The decorative style of the chest
        int - size The maximum number of items the chest can hold
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

               int chestID)
                 throws DatabaseException
        Removes a chest from the database
        Parameters:
        String - username The username of the user whose chest we wish to remove
        int - chestID The ID number of the chest we wish to remove

        Get list of chests IDs of chests belonging to a given user
        Parameters:

        Returns:
